mapper.insert:
insert into teachers ( name, email, password, sub_num, profile_img ) values
( #{i.name}, #{i.email}, #{i.password}, #{i.subNum}, #{i.profileImg} )
insert into managers (email, password, name, profile_img) values (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{profileImg})
mapper.select: select a.*, t.tea_num teaNum, t.name teaName, t.email teaEmail, t.password teaPassword, t.profile_img teaProfileImg from (select g.grd_num grdNum, g.score score, g.grade grade, g.exam_date examDate, j.sub_num subNum, j.description description, j.subject subject, s.userid userid, s.password stuPassword, s.name stuName, s.birthday birthday, s.gender gender, s.reg_date regDate, s.profile_img stuProfileImg, s.stu_num stuNum from grades g join subjects j on j.sub_num = g.sub_num join students s on s.stu_num = g.stu_num) a join teachers t on t.sub_num = a.subNum where a.examDate LIKE #{examDate} AND a.subNum = #{subNum}
